name: Cursed Islands (kalzme)
description:
Your men got lost at sea and are stranded on the Cursed Islands!
Navigate the sea in search of your lost crew but beware, the Cursed Islands have several tricks to make you lose your way.

HELP
MOVEMENT:
Use the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to steer.
The wind will determine your speed, going in the same direction as the wind is faster than going against the wind.

UI:
The arrow on top of the screen indicates the direction the wind is blowing.
The compass in the top right corner will help you stay oriented.
Keep track of how many crewmembers you have found in the top left corner.

MENU CONTROLS
Use the arrow keys to choose between menu items.
ENTER to select the menu item.
ESC to go back (also works in game)

Resolution:
1920x1080
